sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CMMN0320 ( ZPCD , ZPCD_SEIL_NUM , BUILD_MANGE_NUM , CUTDOG_CD , ROAD_NM_CTAPV , ROAD_NM_CTATGU , ROAD_NM_TAT , ROAD_NM_LI , ROAD_NM_SAN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN , ROAD_NM_CD , ROAD_NM , ROAD_NM_UNGR , BUILD_NUM_BOBN , BUILD_NUM_BUBN , BUILD_NM , DTL_PATR_BUILD_NM , TATD_SEIL_NUM , ADSTT_DONG_CD , ADSTT_DONG_NM , LOT_DSTTN_NM , MV_REAS_CD , CHNG_DT , CHNG_BFR_ROAD_NM_ADDR , CTATGU_BUILD_NM , JON_HUS , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #zpcd# , #zpcdSeilNum# , #buildMangeNum# , #cutdogCd# , #roadNmCtapv# , #roadNmCtatgu# , #roadNmTat# , #roadNmLi# , #roadNmSan# , #roadNmLtnumBobn# , #roadNmLtnumBubn# , #roadNmCd# , #roadNm# , #roadNmUngr# , #buildNumBobn# , #buildNumBubn# , #buildNm# , #dtlPatrBuildNm# , #tatdSeilNum# , #adsttDongCd# , #adsttDongNm# , #lotDsttnNm# , #mvReasCd# , #chngDt# , #chngBfrRoadNmAddr# , #ctatguBuildNm# , #jonHus# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CMMN0320 SET ZPCD=#zpcd# , ZPCD_SEIL_NUM=#zpcdSeilNum# , BUILD_MANGE_NUM=#buildMangeNum# , CUTDOG_CD=#cutdogCd# , ROAD_NM_CTAPV=#roadNmCtapv# , ROAD_NM_CTATGU=#roadNmCtatgu# , ROAD_NM_TAT=#roadNmTat# , ROAD_NM_LI=#roadNmLi# , ROAD_NM_SAN=#roadNmSan# , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN=#roadNmLtnumBobn# , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN=#roadNmLtnumBubn# , ROAD_NM_CD=#roadNmCd# , ROAD_NM=#roadNm# , ROAD_NM_UNGR=#roadNmUngr# , BUILD_NUM_BOBN=#buildNumBobn# , BUILD_NUM_BUBN=#buildNumBubn# , BUILD_NM=#buildNm# , DTL_PATR_BUILD_NM=#dtlPatrBuildNm# , TATD_SEIL_NUM=#tatdSeilNum# , ADSTT_DONG_CD=#adsttDongCd# , ADSTT_DONG_NM=#adsttDongNm# , LOT_DSTTN_NM=#lotDsttnNm# , MV_REAS_CD=#mvReasCd# , CHNG_DT=#chngDt# , CHNG_BFR_ROAD_NM_ADDR=#chngBfrRoadNmAddr# , CTATGU_BUILD_NM=#ctatguBuildNm# , JON_HUS=#jonHus# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE ZPCD=#zpcd# AND ZPCD_SEIL_NUM=#zpcdSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM CMMN0320 WHERE ZPCD=#zpcd# AND ZPCD_SEIL_NUM=#zpcdSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ZPCD , ZPCD_SEIL_NUM , BUILD_MANGE_NUM , CUTDOG_CD , ROAD_NM_CTAPV , ROAD_NM_CTATGU , ROAD_NM_TAT , ROAD_NM_LI , ROAD_NM_SAN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN , ROAD_NM_CD , ROAD_NM , ROAD_NM_UNGR , BUILD_NUM_BOBN , BUILD_NUM_BUBN , BUILD_NM , DTL_PATR_BUILD_NM , TATD_SEIL_NUM , ADSTT_DONG_CD , ADSTT_DONG_NM , LOT_DSTTN_NM , MV_REAS_CD , CHNG_DT , CHNG_BFR_ROAD_NM_ADDR , CTATGU_BUILD_NM , JON_HUS , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM CMMN0320 WHERE ZPCD=#zpcd# AND ZPCD_SEIL_NUM=#zpcdSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT ZPCD AS OLD_ZPCD , BASE_AR_NUM AS ZPCD , ( FN_DTN_ADDR_VIEW || '
' || ORG_ADDR ) AS FN_DTN_ADDR_VIEW , FN_DTN_ADDR , DTL_PATR_ADDR , ZPCD_SEIL_NUM , BUILD_MANGE_NUM , CUTDOG_CD , ROAD_NM_CTAPV , ROAD_NM_CTATGU , ROAD_NM_TAT , ROAD_NM_LI , ROAD_NM_SAN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN , ROAD_NM_CD , ROAD_NM , ROAD_NM_UNGR , BUILD_NUM_BOBN , BUILD_NUM_BUBN , BUILD_NM , DTL_PATR_BUILD_NM , TATD_SEIL_NUM , ADSTT_DONG_CD , ADSTT_DONG_NM , LOT_DSTTN_NM , MV_REAS_CD , CHNG_DT , CHNG_BFR_ROAD_NM_ADDR , CTATGU_BUILD_NM , JON_HUS , BASE_AR_NUM , DTL_ADDR_YN FROM ( SELECT ZPCD AS OLD_ZPCD , BASE_AR_NUM AS ZPCD , ((ROAD_NM_CTAPV || ' ' || ROAD_NM_CTATGU) || ' ' || ( CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_LI IS NOT NULL THEN (ROAD_NM_TAT || ' ') ELSE '' END) || (ROAD_NM || ' ' || (CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_UNGR = '1' THEN '지하 ' ELSE '' END) || BUILD_NUM_BOBN || (CASE WHEN (TRIM(NVL(BUILD_NUM_BUBN,'TT')) <> 'TT') AND (TRIM(NVL(BUILD_NUM_BUBN,'TT')) <> '0') THEN '-' || BUILD_NUM_BUBN ELSE '' END) ) || ( CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_LI IS NULL THEN ' (' || ROAD_NM_TAT || ( CASE WHEN JON_HUS = '1' THEN ',' || CTATGU_BUILD_NM || ')' ELSE ')' END ) ELSE '' END)) AS FN_DTN_ADDR_VIEW , (ROAD_NM_CTAPV || ' ' || ROAD_NM_CTATGU) || ' ' || ( CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_LI IS NOT NULL THEN (ROAD_NM_TAT || ' ') ELSE '' END) || (ROAD_NM || ' ' || (CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_UNGR = '1' THEN '지하 ' ELSE '' END) || BUILD_NUM_BOBN || (CASE WHEN (TRIM(NVL(BUILD_NUM_BUBN,'TT')) <> 'TT') AND (TRIM(NVL(BUILD_NUM_BUBN,'TT')) <> '0') THEN '-' || BUILD_NUM_BUBN ELSE '' END) ) AS FN_DTN_ADDR , ( ( CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_LI IS NULL THEN ' (' || ROAD_NM_TAT || ( CASE WHEN JON_HUS = '1' THEN ',' || CTATGU_BUILD_NM || ')' ELSE ')' END ) ELSE '' END) ) AS DTL_PATR_ADDR , ( ROAD_NM_CTAPV || ' ' || ROAD_NM_CTATGU|| ' ' || ROAD_NM_TAT|| ' ' || ROAD_NM_LI || ' ' || DECODE(ROAD_NM_SAN,0,'','산') || ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN || '-' || ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN ) AS ORG_ADDR , ZPCD_SEIL_NUM , BUILD_MANGE_NUM , CUTDOG_CD , ROAD_NM_CTAPV , ROAD_NM_CTATGU , ROAD_NM_TAT , ROAD_NM_LI , ROAD_NM_SAN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN , ROAD_NM_CD , ROAD_NM , ROAD_NM_UNGR , BUILD_NUM_BOBN , BUILD_NUM_BUBN , BUILD_NM , DTL_PATR_BUILD_NM , TATD_SEIL_NUM , ADSTT_DONG_CD , ADSTT_DONG_NM , LOT_DSTTN_NM , MV_REAS_CD , CHNG_DT , CHNG_BFR_ROAD_NM_ADDR , CTATGU_BUILD_NM , JON_HUS , BASE_AR_NUM , DTL_ADDR_YN FROM CMMN0320 ) WHERE 1=1 ( (FN_DTN_ADDR_VIEW LIKE '%' || #searchWord# || '%') OR ( ORG_ADDR LIKE '%' || #searchWord# || '%') ) ROAD_NM_CTAPV=#roadNmCtapv# ROAD_NM_CTATGU=#roadNmCtatgu# ((TRIM(ROAD_NM_TAT) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#roadNmTat#) || '%') OR (TRIM(ADSTT_DONG_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#roadNmTat#) || '%')) TRIM(ROAD_NM_LI) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#roadNmLi#) || '%' (TO_CHAR(ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN) || '-' || TO_CHAR(ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN)) LIKE '%' || #roadNmLtnumBobn# || '%' TRIM(ROAD_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#roadNm#) || '%' (BUILD_NUM_BOBN || '-' || BUILD_NUM_BUBN) LIKE '%' || #buildNumBobn# || '%' ((TRIM(BUILD_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#buildNm#) || '%') OR (TRIM(CTATGU_BUILD_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#buildNm#) || '%')) AND ZPCD IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ZPCD ASC , ZPCD_SEIL_NUM ASC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT ZPCD AS OLD_ZPCD , BASE_AR_NUM AS ZPCD , ( FN_DTN_ADDR_VIEW || '
' || ORG_ADDR ) AS FN_DTN_ADDR_VIEW , FN_DTN_ADDR , DTL_PATR_ADDR , ZPCD_SEIL_NUM , BUILD_MANGE_NUM , CUTDOG_CD , ROAD_NM_CTAPV , ROAD_NM_CTATGU , ROAD_NM_TAT , ROAD_NM_LI , ROAD_NM_SAN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN , ROAD_NM_CD , ROAD_NM , ROAD_NM_UNGR , BUILD_NUM_BOBN , BUILD_NUM_BUBN , BUILD_NM , DTL_PATR_BUILD_NM , TATD_SEIL_NUM , ADSTT_DONG_CD , ADSTT_DONG_NM , LOT_DSTTN_NM , MV_REAS_CD , CHNG_DT , CHNG_BFR_ROAD_NM_ADDR , CTATGU_BUILD_NM , JON_HUS , BASE_AR_NUM , DTL_ADDR_YN FROM ( SELECT ZPCD AS OLD_ZPCD , BASE_AR_NUM AS ZPCD , ((ROAD_NM_CTAPV || ' ' || ROAD_NM_CTATGU) || ' ' || ( CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_LI IS NOT NULL THEN (ROAD_NM_TAT || ' ') ELSE '' END) || (ROAD_NM || ' ' || (CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_UNGR = '1' THEN '지하 ' ELSE '' END) || BUILD_NUM_BOBN || (CASE WHEN (TRIM(NVL(BUILD_NUM_BUBN,'TT')) <> 'TT') AND (TRIM(NVL(BUILD_NUM_BUBN,'TT')) <> '0') THEN '-' || BUILD_NUM_BUBN ELSE '' END) ) || ( CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_LI IS NULL THEN ' (' || ROAD_NM_TAT || ( CASE WHEN JON_HUS = '1' THEN ',' || CTATGU_BUILD_NM || ')' ELSE ')' END ) ELSE '' END)) AS FN_DTN_ADDR_VIEW , (ROAD_NM_CTAPV || ' ' || ROAD_NM_CTATGU) || ' ' || ( CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_LI IS NOT NULL THEN (ROAD_NM_TAT || ' ') ELSE '' END) || (ROAD_NM || ' ' || (CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_UNGR = '1' THEN '지하 ' ELSE '' END) || BUILD_NUM_BOBN || (CASE WHEN (TRIM(NVL(BUILD_NUM_BUBN,'TT')) <> 'TT') AND (TRIM(NVL(BUILD_NUM_BUBN,'TT')) <> '0') THEN '-' || BUILD_NUM_BUBN ELSE '' END) ) AS FN_DTN_ADDR , ( ( CASE WHEN ROAD_NM_LI IS NULL THEN ' (' || ROAD_NM_TAT || ( CASE WHEN JON_HUS = '1' THEN ',' || CTATGU_BUILD_NM || ')' ELSE ')' END ) ELSE '' END) ) AS DTL_PATR_ADDR , ( ROAD_NM_CTAPV || ' ' || ROAD_NM_CTATGU|| ' ' || ROAD_NM_TAT|| ' ' || ROAD_NM_LI || ' ' || DECODE(ROAD_NM_SAN,0,'','산') || ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN || '-' || ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN ) AS ORG_ADDR , ZPCD_SEIL_NUM , BUILD_MANGE_NUM , CUTDOG_CD , ROAD_NM_CTAPV , ROAD_NM_CTATGU , ROAD_NM_TAT , ROAD_NM_LI , ROAD_NM_SAN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN , ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN , ROAD_NM_CD , ROAD_NM , ROAD_NM_UNGR , BUILD_NUM_BOBN , BUILD_NUM_BUBN , BUILD_NM , DTL_PATR_BUILD_NM , TATD_SEIL_NUM , ADSTT_DONG_CD , ADSTT_DONG_NM , LOT_DSTTN_NM , MV_REAS_CD , CHNG_DT , CHNG_BFR_ROAD_NM_ADDR , CTATGU_BUILD_NM , JON_HUS , BASE_AR_NUM , DTL_ADDR_YN FROM CMMN0320 ) WHERE 1=1 ( (TEMP_LTNUM01 LIKE '%' || TRIM(#searchWord#) || '%') OR ( TEMP_LTNUM02 LIKE '%' || TRIM(#searchWord#) || '%') ) ROAD_NM_CTAPV=#roadNmCtapv# ROAD_NM_CTATGU=#roadNmCtatgu# ((TRIM(ROAD_NM_TAT) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#roadNmTat#) || '%') OR (TRIM(ADSTT_DONG_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#roadNmTat#) || '%')) TRIM(ROAD_NM_LI) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#roadNmLi#) || '%' (TO_CHAR(ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BOBN) || '-' || TO_CHAR(ROAD_NM_LTNUM_BUBN)) LIKE '%' || #roadNmLtnumBobn# || '%' TRIM(ROAD_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#roadNm#) || '%' (BUILD_NUM_BOBN || '-' || BUILD_NUM_BUBN) LIKE '%' || #buildNumBobn# || '%' ((TRIM(BUILD_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#buildNm#) || '%') OR (TRIM(CTATGU_BUILD_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(#buildNm#) || '%')) AND ZPCD IS NOT NULL )

SELECT COMM_CD_NM AS ROAD_NM_CTAPV , (COMM_CD_NM) AS ROAD_NM_CTAPV_DISP
FROM BASS0300 WHERE OPN_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND RPSTTV_CD = 'D003'
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD ASC , ORD ASC , COMM_CD ASC

SELECT DISTINCT ROAD_NM_CTAPV , ROAD_NM_CTATGU , (ROAD_NM_CTATGU) AS ROAD_NM_CTATGU_DISP FROM CMMN0320 WHERE 1=1
ROAD_NM_CTAPV LIKE #roadNmCtapv# || '%'
ORDER BY ROAD_NM_CTATGU ASC
